title: Crafting System
body:
Hey can someone clear up some things for me? I've been reading into the crafting system but parts of it still aren't making sense to me. 

I own all the champions so can I get blue essence? 

What exactly is a champion shard? Are they the same as a mastery token? 

I got a S post game, but didn't receive a token, why?

Thanks in advance!

replies.body:
First question: yes.

Second question: a mastery token and a champion shard are not the same. Champion shards come from hextech boxes (or bought individually in the store) , and they can be disenchanted into blue essence, be upgraded into champions, or rerolled with two other shards to get a full champion. Mastery token are received from getting an s grade on a champion that you have at least mastery rank 5 on.

Third question: see answer to second question, were you mastery rank 5 with the champion? If you were that sounds like it could be some sort of bug.

Awesome, thank you! Yes I'm working towards level 7 master on Thresh, don't have blue essence, don't have thresh permanents, didn't know where to get thresh shard... but now I see! Its in the shop. 

I have 3 Thresh shards, just won a game, got a S but didn't get a token... it could be because I have the max tokens to advance, yes?

Thanks again!

Edit: Just bought enough blue essence off the store to get my level 7 mastery! Thanks! :)
